Description:
Education, Qualifications & Experiences

You should ideally have a diploma or a vocational training in a kindergarten / children care related field with previous similar work experiences. A true passion for children and a creative, but caring mind are essentials. Good command of English and good interpersonal abilities are additional required.

Knowledge & Competencies

The ideal candidate will be pleasant, mature and patient with good guest service skills and the ability to handle stress. You are a positive, smiley individual with an outgoing and approachable character, who works well under pressure in a fast paced environment and be a great team player, who enjoys working with a multi-cultural team and guests alike, while possessing following additional competencies:

Understanding the job
Teamwork
Taking Responsibility
Recognising Differences
Adaptability
Customer FocusJob Details
